__e: You tell them that Alan and I got drunk with him, we're still partying.
Maybe you should try it for once, instead of going out drinking every night and coming to work while messed up.
Oh, no, no, no I couldn't do that.
You can get as drunk as you like for all I care!
You can't, I'm telling you-- you can't fuckin' eat and drink like an animal, put up with this fuckin' brasciole here. You can't do this.
